descriptive_fields.accident_summary: A blue sedan (Vehicle A) traveling at moderate speed failed to slow down for stationary traffic at a signalized intersection and collided with the rear of a white SUV (Vehicle B).
descriptive_fields.liability_indicator: Vehicle A is determined to be 100% at fault for the collision due to a clear failure to maintain a safe following distance and inattentive driving.

reasoning_trace: Vehicle B is fully stopped at a red traffic light in a line of traffic.
Vehicle A is approaching from the rear at a consistent speed with no apparent deceleration.
The driver of Vehicle A does not appear to be looking forward at the road.
Vehicle A impacts the rear of Vehicle B without any prior braking.
Both vehicles move forward slightly from the force of the impact.
